export interface IAirtableThumbnail {
  url: string
  width: number
  height: number
}

export interface IAirtableAttachment {
  id: string
  url: string
  filename: string
  size: number
  type: string
  thumbnails?: {
    small: IAirtableThumbnail
    large: IAirtableThumbnail
    full: IAirtableThumbnail
  }
}

export interface Apartments {
  name: string
  link: string
  quickNotes: string
  pictures: Array<IAirtableAttachment>
  rent: number
  squareFeet: number
  ratingDisregardingPrice: number
  valueRatingPrice: number
  pros: Array<'Good View' | 'Architecture/Design' | 'Natural light/Tall windows' | 'High Ceilings' | 'Rooftop/Balcony' | 'Decent Gym' | 'Pool' | 'Spacious' | 'Good Community Amenities' | 'Great Location'>
  cons: Array<'Cookie cutter design/fixtures' | 'Poor lighting' | 'Small shower' | 'No view (view of street/another building/etc)' | 'Bad Location' | 'Small Room'>
  district: Array<string>
  visited: 'Want to' | 'Scheduled' | 'Visited' | 'Table for now'
  visitNotes: string
  comments: string
  duration: number
  test2: Array<string>
  imagesFromTest2: Array<string | boolean | number | Record<string, unknown>>
}

export interface Districts {
  name: string
  images: Array<IAirtableAttachment>
  description: string
  apartments: Array<string>
  apartments_2: Array<string>
}
